Articles.Content:
**To honor the passing of the Souposphere**

![W7d6slk.png](http://i.imgur.com/W7d6slk.png)

A little something I made...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Awesome. Saving it to impress newcomers with "Back in my day, we didn't need no newfangled drag. Realistic?! Pah!"
Someday in KSP 2.0, we will look back at primitive pre 0.90 versions of KSP and think of them as the same way we think of 0.7.3 right now.
